REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1478 reute r f BC-GNB-JOINS-IN-LEVERAGE 03-24 0056

TEXT.TITLE: GNB JOINS IN LEVERAGED BUYOUT OF FRENCH UNIT
TEXT.BODY: <GNB Inc> said it joined with the management of the French company Compagnie Francaise d'Electro-Chimie to purchase the company for an undisclosed amount. The French company, which produces lead-acid batteries, had sales in 1986 of 75 mln dlrs, GNB said. Reuter
